opportunities.title: Halloween Charity Event in the Park
opportunities.description: We are running a charity event in the park to raise donations for Ronald McDonald House. All volunteers are encouraged to come in costume. We are looking for Cooks, Actors, Greeters, and anyone willing to help with cleanup after.
